Title: Freeza's Last Super Transformation! A Terror Greater Than Hell Begins
Writer: Takao Koyama, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Frieza has begun his ultimate transformation, and Vegeta's only hope to defeat the monster is suffering a mortal wound. If the Saiyan warrior can convince Dende to restore his strength, he may gain the power to defeat his enemy!
